name: when i wake
description:
when i wake and ask, Why is my
heart here? when i wake and seek,
Where is my heart moving? when i
wake and speak, How will my heart
go? when i wake and listen, What
is my heart saying? when i wake
and when i sleep and when i gaze,
Who dares to separate the seas
as i move along curves between
a heart that aches and a heart that
swells, a heart that presses and
a heart that bursts? in beat by
blood-dripping beat comprehensions
and surprises bloom. collisions may
perhaps
be space debris or self-
discovery or something like
these paths i did not make but glisten
sparkle with a scent (but how)
of under-standing or of love
or of simple scenes where petals leave
some flowered trees,
a fall upon ambivalent line through final life
or final climb with whispers waking, Watch
and learn to dance with spaces in-between
until you rest with us upon the grass

--

Original poetry by metanivek, 2021
